name: float_scan
author: AFNI Developers
description: Scans the input file of IEEE floating point numbers for illegal values: infinities and not-a-number (NaN) values.

inputs.description: Input file containing IEEE floating point numbers
inputs.name: Input Filename

inputs.description: Writes a copy of the input file to stdout, replacing illegal values with 0.
inputs.name: Fix Illegal Values

inputs.description: Verbose mode: print out index of each illegal value.
inputs.name: Verbose Mode

inputs.description: Skip the first n floating point locations (i.e., the first 4*n bytes) in the file
inputs.name: Skip Initial Locations

output-files.description: Output file with illegal values replaced by 0 when -fix flag is used
output-files.name: Standard Output
